subtitle: A deliciously spicy and satisfying stew, a complete meal in itself - and ideal for those cold nights when the family need something hearty to warm them up!

method.text: Place the potatoes in a pan of boiling water. Return to the boil and simmer for 5-6 min until just tender. Drain.
Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the onion, garlic, garam masala, turmeric and cumin and fry for 2-3 min until softened.
Add the tuna to the pan and fry gently for 3-5 min, turning carefully until flesh changes colour from pink to a light brown colour.
Add the tomatoes to the pan with the wine vinegar, lemon juice and saffron threads. Cover and simmer for 8-10 min stirring occasionally.
Add the potatoes and peas to the pan. Season. Simmer for 10 min, until warmed through.
Spoon into a warmed serving dish.

title: Spicy tuna stew
